title: Crime Alert 05.08.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.08.19
description:
911 call by police officer who shot her neighbor, released. Missouri sheriff sentenced for wire taps with a warrant. Another cold case solved by DNA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
